document.full_text: honduras was readmitted to the organization of american states on wednesday, repairing ties with the hemispheric group two years after president manuel zelaya was toppled in a widely condemned coup.
document.title: honduras readmitted to oas after coup
lines_and_colors: honduras was readmitted to the organization of american states on wednesday, repairing ties with the hemispheric group two years after president manuel zelaya was toppled in a widely condemned coup.
